name: Elephants
special_abilities: PLACE  FACE DOWN AND SIDEWAYS UNDER AN OPPONENT'S FACE DOWN CARD.  IF IT IS UNDER A DRAGON, THE DRAGON LOSES 1 STRENGTH WHEN ATTACKING AS LONG AS ELEPHANTS ARE ON THE DRAGON.  DISCARD THE ELEPHANTS IF UNDER A TERRAIN CARD.
lore: Elephants crush Dragons as they fall.
